Comment: Jointly with the Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Oversight – The Madison Square Garden Property Tax Exemption:  Evaluating its purpose and effectiveness
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – The Madison Square Garden Property Tax Exemption:  Evaluating its purpose and effectiveness

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State of New York to end the real property tax exemption granted to Madison Square Garden (“MSG” or the “Garden”) so that the revenue raised from putting MSG back on the City’s property tax rolls can be used to provide City services or tax relief to City residents.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS to end the real property tax exemption granted to Madison Square Garden ("MSG" or the "Garden").

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on State and Federal Legislation
AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
Oversight – The Madison Square Garden Property Tax Exemption:  Evaluating its purpose and effectiveness
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – The Madison Square Garden Property Tax Exemption:  Evaluating its purpose and effectiveness

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State of New York to end the real property tax exemption granted to Madison Square Garden (“MSG” or the “Garden”) so that the revenue raised from putting MSG back on the City’s property tax rolls can be used to provide City services or tax relief to City residents.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS to end the real property tax exemption granted to Madison Square Garden ("MSG" or the "Garden").
